TopicTitle: Can't enter VAB, Spaceplane Hanger and Tracking Station, game dont freeze nor crash (KSPRC)

Articles.Content:
Just reinstall KSP now that 1.0 is out.

I downloaded some of the mods I used to have but for some reason I can't enter VAB, Spaceplane Hanger and Tracking Station.

After I click in one of those building I cant click anywhere else, but the game is not frozen, I can still hit esc to open the menu and still open the contracts in the top right cornor.

The mods I have install are basically the ones that comes with KSPRC:

ActiveTextureManagement

AmbientLightAdjustment

BoulderCo

DDSLoader

DistantObject

EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements

KerbalEngineer

KittopiaSpace

KSPRC

PlanetShine

Scatterer

TextureReplacer

UniverseReplacer

Also the KSPRC replaces sharedassets9.assets at KSP\_Data, i couldnt figure out what is causing this issue.

When I start the game there is no message about incompatibility or updated versions

If it is what I think it is, it is a common bug. You'll also get the issue where you cannot end flights or switch to another vessel.

Try restarting your game.

Also, upload your log file. It's in the main KSP directory, the one above\* GameData

EDIT: \* = In the hierarchy, not order-wise

> 
> If it is what I think it is, it is a common bug. You'll also get the issue where you cannot end flights or switch to another vessel.
> Try restarting your game.
> 
> Also, upload your log file. It's in the main KSP directory, the one above\* GameData
> 
> EDIT: \* = In the hierarchy, not order-wise

Thank you for the answer!

After several trial and error I found out that the problem was being caused by the TextureReplacer mod. Remove it fix the problem even at already existent save files!
